cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on January 13, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5746, Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 189 (Wednesday, October 27, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BEYER:
H.R. 5746.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, section 8 of the Constitution of the United
States.
[Page H5959]

latestAction.text: Motion to proceed to consideration of the motion to reconsider the vote by which cloture on the motion to concur in the House amendment to the Senate amendment to H.R. 5746 (Record Vote No. 9) withdrawn in Senate.

title: Freedom to Vote: John R. Lewis Act
